trans-unit.source:
\n

Defines a method that supports custom formatting of the value of an object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Converts the value of a specified object to an equivalent string representation using specified format and culture-specific formatting information.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx$xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object that supplies format information about the current instance.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The string representation of the value of arg, formatted as specified by format and formatProvider.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx $xx$xxx$$xx$$ xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xxx $xx$xxxxxxXxxxxxxx$$xx$.$$x$$x
